data.title: List of M*A*S*H writers
data.meta_description: This is a list of writers for the television series M*A*S*H sorted by the amount of episodes written. Collaborations are marked with dashes. (-) Contributions and episode numbers are noted in parenthesis. Larry Gelbart "Pilot" (S01E01) "Chief Surgeon Who?" (S01E04) "Germ Warfare" (S01E11) "Dear...
data.text:
This is a list of writers for the television series M*A*S*H sorted by the amount of episodes written. Collaborations are marked with dashes. (-) Contributions and episode numbers are noted in parenthesis.
